title: FS: T227 Marquard Honest Long Cut

posts.post_title: FS: T227 Marquard Honest Long Cut
posts.post_content: I received this card in a multiple card trade with another board member that helped us both. I would like to sell/trade but am unsure of where to price this, any help or trade/buy offers would be appreciated. Obviously pretty beat up with a 1/2 inch tear on bottom. Thanks. Edited to add: MOVED TO EBAY
